title: Russell Brand joins London housing protest
content: This video can not be playedComedian Russell Brand joined protesters in London on Thursday outside Bow County Court.A group of homeless mothers known as 'Focus E15' from the Carpenters Estate, in east London are going to court to fight their eviction from abandoned flats.They claim their local authority is forcing them to move to other cities even though there is plenty of suitable social housing in the area.
